rows.label: qst700603_msg0001
rows.name:
Thank you, brothers! With
this, I think I can manage!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0002
rows.name: Actually, it's almost complete!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0003
rows.name:
I'll attach the parts you gave
me and bring it right over!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh! So this is the "Automatic
Bug-Catching Machine DX"!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0005
rows.name: Not bad, not bad at all!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0006
rows.name: So, what do we do with this?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0007
rows.name:
You're not planning on using it in
the middle of the city, are you?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0008
rows.name: N-No!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0009
rows.name:
This is a machine for creating a
smokescreen to lure out bugs.

rows.label: qst700603_msg0010
rows.name:
If you place this machine where you
think the bugs you want are and activate
it, the bugs will come to you.

rows.label: qst700603_msg0011
rows.name: I see! That's amazing!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0012
rows.name:
So... I have another
favor to ask you guys...

rows.label: qst700603_msg0013
rows.name:
What, no need to hesitate. We're
already in this together.

rows.label: qst700603_msg0014
rows.name:
Besides, I told you before, right?
"Let's prove it together."

rows.label: qst700603_msg0015
rows.name: Thank you, brother...

rows.label: qst700603_msg0016
rows.name:
So, what's the next favor
you want to ask us?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0017
rows.name: Um...

rows.label: qst700603_msg0018
rows.name:
Do you guys know a place
called Haradd Hills?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0019
rows.name: You do?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0020
rows.name:
Yeah, past the Dannagh Desert from the
capital, near Felt Village. There was
a place with that name, I believe.

rows.label: qst700603_msg0021
rows.name:
Isn't that place probably near where
we first met Adel and the others?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0023
rows.name:
There's a rumor that in Haradd
Hills, there are a lot of the
bugs I'm currently after.

rows.label: qst700603_msg0024
rows.name:
I want you guys to take this
machine there and catch a
lot of those bugs for me.

rows.label: qst700603_msg0025
rows.name: Got it! Leave it to me!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0026
rows.name:
Then, we'll borrow this "Automatic
Bug-Catching Machine DX"!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0027
rows.name: Yeah! I'm counting on you, brothers!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0028
rows.name: Ah! And!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0029
rows.name: This is my first invention...

rows.label: qst700603_msg0030
rows.name:
So, I really want to know if
this machine worked properly!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0031
rows.name: Yeah! A promise between men!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0032
rows.name:
I'll be sure to come back
and tell you the results!
